# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-dac-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1073/org/openo/nfvo/monitor/dac/dac-api/dac-standalone/1.0.0-RC1/dac-standalone-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-dac-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f nfvo-dac-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8206
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1073 > VERSION
